verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Bwana tupe amani,
amani amani amani,
O-lo-lo o-lo-lo amani,
amani amani amani.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Bwana tupe upendo,
upendo upendo upendo,
O-lo-lo o-lo-lo upendo,
upendo upendo upendo.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Bwana tupe furaha,
furaha furaha furaha,
O-lo-lo o-lo-lo furaha,
furaha furaha furaha.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Bwana tupe faraja,
faraja faraja faraja,
O-lo-lo o-lo-lo faraja,
faraja faraja faraja

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Bwana tupe fadhili,
fadhili fadhili fadhili,
O-lo-lo o-lo-lo fadhili,
fadhili fadhili fadhili.
